items.sentence: The heat doesn\'t seem to bother Tom at all.
Did that guy say bad things about Tom again?
Tom drank about three times as much as Mary.
I immediately knew that there was a problem.
I just want to forget about the whole thing.
Perhaps Tom and Mary should travel together.
Tom told me he wasn\'t able to speak French.
Let me tell you what\'s going to happen now.
I didn\'t even get a chance to eat anything.
I didn\'t know Tom spoke French so fluently.
Tom couldn\'t do everything he needed to do.
Did Tom know we didn\'t want him to do that?
I used to play the trombone in a jazz combo.
I used to sing every day when I was a child.
Tom didn\'t sing the song that we requested.
Tom doesn\'t have to be back until tomorrow.
Tom doesn\'t know where Mary studied French.
Tom doesn\'t think he can make the deadline.
I don\'t even know who Tom\'s girlfriend is.
Tom should\'ve told Mary not to leave early.
Tom shouldn\'t have left the party so early.
Tom shouldn\'t have tried singing that song.
Let\'s inquire about our hotel reservations.
Let\'s rent a bus and all go there together.
Let\'s see if we can cancel our reservation.
Would you like me to talk to Tom about this?
Would you like me to teach you how to drive?
Would you like to be considered for the job?
I\'m not sure anybody would want to do that.
I\'m not sure anyone would buy one of these.
I\'m not sure that Tom has to do that again.
I\'m not sure that Tom should do that again.
I\'m not sure that Tom will be able do that.
I\'m not sure that Tom would let me do that.
I could go on and on about it, but I won\'t.
Did you really plan to do this all yourself?
Did you really think Tom could speak French?
Did you see anything that needs to be fixed?
Tom and Mary enjoyed their evening together.
Tom and Mary were talking about the concert.
Tom and Mary were the first ones to do that.
I hope you\'ll be able to come to the party.
I wouldn\'t do that if I were in your shoes.
There are a lot of problems we can\'t avoid.
Do you want to grab a bite to eat somewhere?
Do you want to have dinner with me sometime?
Does Tom still enjoy watching horror movies?
I know that Tom was the last one to do that.
I used to watch a lot more TV than I do now.
Quite of few of the children looked unhappy.
